settings.title: Eco-Friendly
settings.description: Our products are made with sustainable materials and biodegradable ingredients, minimizing environmental impact.

settings.title: Convenient
settings.description: Perfect for on-the-go use, our products are compact, lightweight, and easy to carry during your adventures.

settings.title: Zero Waste
settings.description: We're committed to reducing waste by using recyclable packaging and promoting reusable solutions.

settings.title: What Our Customers Say
settings.subheading: Hear from our satisfied customers about their experience with NatureBuff

settings.name: Sarah Johnson
settings.title: Outdoor Enthusiast
settings.quote: NatureBuff's products have completely changed my outdoor experience. The wipes are gentle on my skin and the environment.

settings.name: Michael Chen
settings.title: Hiking Guide
settings.quote: As someone who spends most of their time outdoors, I appreciate how convenient and eco-friendly these products are.

settings.name: Emily Rodriguez
settings.title: Environmental Activist
settings.quote: Finally, a hygiene brand that truly cares about sustainability. Their zero-waste approach is exactly what we need more of.
